detectors.description: pool.claimReward() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x1f16a272d6d0c88230fc6849a26019da71b70a35-pool.sol#78-114) uses a weak PRNG: random() <= currentRiskChance (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x1f16a272d6d0c88230fc6849a26019da71b70a35-pool.sol#88)

pool.random() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x1f16a272d6d0c88230fc6849a26019da71b70a35-pool.sol#147-156) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: seed = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(block.timestamp + block.difficulty + ((uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(block.coinbase)))) / (block.timestamp)) + block.gaslimit + ((uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(msg.sender)))) / (block.timestamp)) + block.number))) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x1f16a272d6d0c88230fc6849a26019da71b70a35-pool.sol#148-154)
